title: Segmentation fault (core dumped) in C++ API for centos
body_html:
When I use C++ API do "auto out_tensor = module->forward(inputs).toTensor();"
there is "Segmentation fault (core dumped)"

but when I use python API do the same thing .It is successful.
when I use C++ API in Ubuntu . It is successful.

I use C++ API in centos. It is unsuccessful.
body_text:
When I use C++ API do "auto out_tensor = module->forward(inputs).toTensor();"
there is "Segmentation fault (core dumped)"
but when I use python API do the same thing .It is successful.
when I use C++ API in Ubuntu . It is successful.
I use C++ API in centos. It is unsuccessful.
body:
When I use C++ API do "auto out_tensor = module->forward(inputs).toTensor();"
there is "Segmentation fault (core dumped)"

but when I use python API do the same thing .It is successful.
when I use C++ API in Ubuntu . It is successful.

I use C++ API in centos. It is unsuccessful.
